name: Forest of Lesbians (Nymph's Tale Ep1)
description:
A nymph, her telepathic direwolf guardian and her schoolfriends visit her home forest. Adventure awaits, but beware of the thirsty lesbians residing in the forest!

A YA fantasy comedy visual novel with gameplay elements. Dialogue heavy. Made in an anime/pixelart/jrpg style. Gameplay ranges from exploring your surroundings to evading enemies and to different kinds of humorous action oriented and fast paced minigames and adventure segments. Gameplay elements can be skipped if you just want to enjoy and advance the story. Episode 1, but it's a pretty much self contained story.

Story: The nymph Ellie has been studying in the human lands. During a short break she visits her forest with her friends. Trouble is brewing in the forest, its guardians restless. Can Ellie and her friends uncover the reason for this unrest? And more importantly, can Ellie protect her exotic girlfriend from the lustful inhabitants of the forest?

(Note: this is not a game made for the "yuri fandom", but a fantasy comedy)
